channel.title: Home tele, pleas answer?
channel.description: i changed coords from home, sow the home is now on a boat, but i try to make the yanille (home tele) to the coords of the boat, i now how to edit name but dont now how to edit the coords, im usint devolution v7 :/

item.title: Home tele, pleas answer?
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

My server is currently using this base, and this is what I have:

This is in player.java

		// initialization packet
		teleportToX = 2837;// 3072;
		teleportToY = 10210;// 3312;

I did edit the coords, so understand, THESE ARE NOT YOUR COORDS.

This is for the starting location.

For the home teleport, youâ€™d find that under client.java and search for the coords of the spell. When you find it, you just edit coords.

Read full topic
